title: APD: Teen’s fatal shooting an accident
content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. —
Albuquerque police identified the 15-year-old killed in a Wednesday shooting as Melky Rodriguez.
They believe his 16-year-old friend accidentally shot him.
Police said Rodriguez stole a gun from a car, and his friend pulled the trigger and killed him while the two were playing with the gun. The friend thought the safety switch was on.
Nobody has been charged with a crime.
